attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make Euthinacia legal in Britian for the many 1000's of people who suffer terminal illness's and also for their family members for having to watch their loved one's suffer everyday with illness's and diseases that erodes their will to live and their spirit with the sheer indignity,despair and sadness that no human should have to watch nor suffer

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
